author: bbuddha.xyz
content: ooh awesome, thanks! is there any links to places in the lighthouse code used to generate proofs?

author: funnygiulio
content: Do consensus tests use stream snappy or block compression snappy?

author: sproul
content: I think it's block. In Rust this came down to framed vs unframed, and I think unframed=block, framed=stream (<https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/38514c07f222ff7783834c48cf5c0a6ee7f346d0/testing/ef_tests/src/decode.rs#L47-L63>, <https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/klauspost/compress/snappy#pkg-overview>)

author: sproul
content: sure, there's just one place currently: <https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/38514c07f222ff7783834c48cf5c0a6ee7f346d0/consensus/types/src/beacon_state.rs#L1675-L1725>
